children.question: Due to the direct effects of a substance (including medication)?

answer_yes.question: Related to the use of neuroleptic medication?

answer_no.question: Associated with a disturbance in attention and awareness characterized by a fluctuating course?
answer_no.answer_yes: SUBSTANCE INTOXICATION DELIRIUM, HYPOACTIVE TYPE; SUBSTANCE WITHDRAWAL DELIRIUM, HYPOACTIVE TYPE; MEDICATION-INDUCED DELIRIUM, HYPOACTIVE ΤΥΡΕ (3.16.1)

answer_no.question: Associated with evidence of decline in one or more of the following cognitive domains: complex attention, executive function, learning and memory, language, perceptual-motor, or social cognition?
Occurring in the context of severe depressive symptoms?
answer_no.answer_no: SUBSTANCE INTOXICATION; SUBSTANCE WITHDRAWAL; OTHER ADVERSE EFFECT OF MEDICATION

answer_no.question: Due to the physiological effects of a general medical condition?

answer_yes.question: Associated with a disturbance in attention and awareness characterized by a fluctuating course?
answer_yes.answer_yes: DELIRIUM DUE TO ANOTHER MEDICAL CONDITION, HYPOACTIVE TΥΡΕ (3.16.1)

answer_no.question: Associated with evidence of decline in one of more of the following cognitive domains: complex attention, executive function, learning and memory, language, perceptual-motor, or social cognition?
answer_no.answer_yes: MAJOR NEUROCOGNITIVE DISORDER DUE TO ANOTHER MEDICAL CONDITION (3.16.2)

answer_no.question: Catatonic mutism plus at least two other catatonic symptoms?
answer_no.answer_yes: CATATONIC DISORDER DUE TO ANOTHER MEDICAL CONDITION (3.2.5)

answer_no.question: Occurring in the context of severe depressive symptoms?
answer_no.answer_yes: DEPRESSIVE DISORDER DUE TO ANOTHER MEDICAL CONDITION

answer_no.question: Associated with at least two characteristic symptoms of Catatonia (e.g., catalepsy, waxy flexibility, negativism, posturing, stereotypy, echolalia)?
answer_no.answer_yes: Catatonia (See Catatonic Symptoms Tree [2.7] for differential diagnosis)

answer_no.question: Occurring in the context of an episode of depressed mood or diminished interest or pleasure accompanied by characteristic depressive symptoms?
answer_no.answer_yes: MAJOR DEPRESSIVE EPISODE in MAJOR DEPRESSIVE DISORDER (3.4.1), BIPOLAR I (3.3.1) or BIPOLAR II (3.3.2) DISORDER, or SCHIZOAFFECTIVE DISORDER (3.2.2)

answer_no.question: Associated with delusions, hallucinations, or disorganized speech?
answer_no.answer_yes: Schizophrenia Spectrum or Other Psychotic Disorder (see Delusions Tree [2.5], Hallucinations Tree [2.6], or Speech Disturbance Tree [2.3] for differential diagnosis)

answer_no.answer_no: Symptom of a general medical condition (e.g., hypothyroidism)
